tpk::AvgFilter2D

tpk::AvgFilter2D Class Reference

#include <AvgFilter2D.h>

Inheritance diagram for tpk::AvgFilter2D:

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

2D averaging filter

The output of an AvgFilter2D is a running average of the input values.
